meanings.definition: People who do not own something.
meanings.sent1: The nonowners of the car pooled together for a ride.
meanings.sent2: The nonowners of the house rented apartments instead.
meanings.sent3: The nonowners of the boat joked about starting a rowing club.
meanings.sent4: In the land of bicycles, the nonowners were the kings of walking.
meanings.sent5: The nonowners in the group stood out with their unique perspective.

meanings.definition: The state of not owning something.
meanings.sent1: The nonowners faced challenges in a world of ownership.
meanings.sent2: The concept of nonowners was discussed in the economics class.
meanings.sent3: The nonowners party celebrated the freedom from possessions.
meanings.sent4: In the game of monopoly, being a nonowner meant tough luck.
meanings.sent5: The nonowners embraced minimalism and simplicity in their lifestyle.
